original_text:
Age of the Gods – Fate Sister
Che cosa sarebbe il mondo delle slot online senza il tema della mitologia greca? E’ davvero impossibile immaginarlo, perché questa tematica ha saputo regalarci grandi emozioni negli anni. Una delle proposte più riuscite è sicuramente quella di Age of the Gods Fate Sisters, firmata da Playtech che ha voluto sorprendere i giocatori con un jackpot progressivo che fa sempre gola a chiunque. Abbiamo una struttura di 5 rulli e 25 linee di pagamento sulle quali si posizionano tre figure femminili particolari, pronte a influenzare il destino del gamer. Lo faranno attraverso vincite, giri gratuiti, una funzione di re-spin che incontriamo sul gioco base e una strepitosa funzionalità Portal Free Games di Fates dove possono essere offerti moltiplicatori fino a 5x e Wild fissi. Scopriamo allora come il Destino possa influenzare non solo la storia della slot, ma anche le tue fortunate vincite.
Grafica e simboli di gioco
Partiamo ovviamente dalla grafica, sulla quale c’è poco da dire: lo sfondo e i simboli che possiamo ammirare sulla griglia di gioco sono ben pensati e realizzati con cura nel dettaglio. E’ la storia stessa a colpire con effetti speciali: racconta le avventure di tre sorelle, note al mondo come le tre Parche: Cloto, Lachesi e Atropo. La prima era colei che filava il filo della vita. La seconda lo avvolgeva sul fuso e decideva quanto filo spettasse a ogni persona. E infine la terza è quella che, con le cesoie, lo tagliava andando così a porre fine alla vita di una persona.
Per rendere accattivante tutto questo sono state presentate diverse funzionalità bonus, come la Sisters’ Gift che si attiva quando vedi le tre protagoniste posizionarsi contemporaneamente sui rulli 1, 3, 5. Resteranno fisse nelle loro posizioni e pagheranno come uno Scatter. Ma questa non è la miglior funzione in assoluto: sei pronto a provare Portal Free Games di Fates? Consiste nell’offerta di giri gratuiti che possono vivacizzare l’esperienza del giocatore. 
 1. Atropo: offre 15 giri gratuiti e moltiplicatore dinamico da 2x a 5x. Se la figura di Atropo appare su uno dei rulli il moltiplicatore aumenta di uno rispettando però il range massimo che abbiamo appena presentato.
2. Lachesis: si hanno 10 giri gratuiti e Wild fissi che si bloccano per i 3 spin gratis seguenti. Nel caso in cui i Wild si fermino su uno già fisso, si resetterà la sua posizione.
3. Cloto: parte con 8 giri gratuiti e Jolly casuali. Ne sono aggiunti 3 casuali per ogni giro gratis. 
Considerazioni finali sulla slot Age of the Gods Fate Sisters
Age of the Gods Fate Sisters è sicuramente una slot fantastica per le funzioni che offre, capaci di valere da sole l’intera esperienza di gioco. Non è male l’idea, è ben realizzato il progetto grafico, ma la massima cura nei bonus game saprà sicuramente sorprendere ogni tipologia di giocatore.
Non dimentichiamo poi i 4 jackpot progressivi da vincere, influenzati direttamente dal valore più o meno alto della scommessa. Potrai giocare a un game casuale dove cercare 3 simboli uguali relativi al montepremi Power, Extra Power, Super Power o Ultimate Power.

Graphics and Game Symbols

Let's start with the graphics, which are well thought out and detailed. It's the story itself that strikes with special effects: it tells the adventures of three sisters, known to the world as the three Fates: Clotho, Lachesis, and Atropos. The first was the one who spun the thread of life. The second wound it on the spindle and decided how much thread would be allotted to each person. And finally, the third is the one who, with her scissors, cut it, thus putting an end to a person's life.

To make all this captivating, several bonus features have been presented, such as the Sisters' Gift, which is activated when you see the three protagonists positioned simultaneously on reels 1, 3, 5. They will remain fixed in their positions and pay like a Scatter. But this is not the best function at all: are you ready to try Fates Portal Free Games? It consists of offering free spins that can enliven the player's experience.
1. Atropos: offers 15 free spins and a dynamic multiplier from 2x to 5x. If the figure of Atropos appears on one of the reels, the multiplier increases by one but respecting the maximum range that we have just presented.
2. Lachesis: you have 10 free spins and fixed Wilds that lock for the following 3 free spins. In case the Wilds stop on one already fixed, its position will be reset.
3. Clotho: starts with 8 free spins and random Wilds. Three random Wilds are added for each free spin.

Final Thoughts on the Age of the Gods Fate Sisters slot

Age of the Gods Fate Sisters is definitely a fantastic slot for the functions it offers, which are capable of worthily representing the entire gaming experience. The idea is not bad, the graphic design is well done, but the maximum care in the bonus games will certainly surprise every type of player.

Let's not forget the 4 progressive jackpots to win, directly influenced by the more or less high value of the bet. You can play a random game where you try to find 3 identical symbols related to the Power, Extra Power, Super Power, or Ultimate Power jackpot.

Review: Age of the Gods – Fate Sister

What would the world of online slots be without the theme of Greek mythology? It's impossible to imagine, because this theme has given us great emotions over the years. One of the most successful proposals is certainly Age of the Gods Fate Sisters, signed by Playtech who wanted to surprise players with a progressive jackpot that always appeals to everyone. We have a structure of 5 reels and 25 paylines on which three particular female figures are positioned, ready to influence the fate of the gamer. They will do so through winnings, free spins, a re-spin feature that we encounter on the base game and a sensational Portal Free Games of Fates functionality where multipliers up to 5x and fixed Wilds can be offered. Let's discover then how Fate can influence not only the story of the slot, but also your lucky winnings.

Graphics and game symbols

Let's start with the graphics, on which there is little to say: the background and symbols that we can admire on the game grid are well thought out and made with care in detail. It is the story itself that impresses with special effects: it tells the adventures of three sisters, known to the world as the three Fates: Clotho, Lachesis and Atropos. The first was the one who spun the thread of life. The second wound it on the spindle and decided how much thread was to be allotted to each person. And finally, the third is the one who, with scissors, cut it, thus putting an end to a person's life.

To make all this attractive, several bonus features have been presented, such as the Sisters' Gift, which is activated when you see the three protagonists simultaneously positioned on reels 1, 3, 5. If you're like me and enjoy playing slots a bit too much, you know that graphics can make or break a game. Thankfully, Age of the Gods Fate Sisters doesn't disappoint in that department. The graphics and symbols used in this game are downright gorgeous. The attention to detail is impressive and it's clear that the developers put a lot of thought into the design. It's almost like each symbol has a personality of its own!

The background is also stunningly crafted. It feels like you're in the clouds, watching the Fates spin the reels for you. The special effects are a cherry on top, with each symbol animating in its own unique way. It's like watching a little performance with each spin.

Overall, the graphics in Age of the Gods Fate Sisters are simply breathtaking. It's like playing a work of art. It's one of those slot games that makes you want to forget about the money and just admire the beauty of it all. But don't do that, because that money is yours to win!

Age of the Gods Fate Sisters is a captivating online slot game created by Playtech. The game has a Greek mythology theme and features three female figures: Clotho, Lachesis, and Atropos. With 5 reels and 25 paylines, Fate Sisters offers several bonus features, including the Sisters' Gift, Free Spins, and a Portal Game of Fates.

Online slot game

Fate Sisters is a visually appealing online slot game that offers players an exciting gaming experience. The game features stunning graphics and engaging gameplay that will keep players entertained for hours. The game is easy to play and has a user-friendly interface. Players can access Fate Sisters on all major platforms, including desktop and mobile devices.

Greek mythology

Age of the Gods Fate Sisters is inspired by Greek mythology, which adds a layer of excitement to the game. The three Fates are the main characters, and their roles are well-designed to reflect their significance in ancient Greek mythology. Fate Sisters offers players a chance to experience the myths and legends come to life in a slot game format.

Bonus features

Fate Sisters offers players a variety of bonus features that make the game even more exciting and rewarding. The Sisters' Gift is one of the bonus features and is activated when the three Fates appear on reels 1, 3, and 5. The Portal Game of Fates is another bonus feature that offers players free spins. Each Fate - Atropos, Lachesis, and Clotho - has its own unique bonus feature that provides players with a dynamic multiplier, fixed Wilds, or random Jokers.

Progressive jackpots

One of the most attractive features of Age of the Gods Fate Sisters is the progressive jackpots. There are four jackpots available - Power, Extra Power, Super Power, and Ultimate Power - and players can win them by playing the random jackpot game. The higher the player's bet, the greater the chance of winning the jackpot. The progressive jackpots add to the excitement of Fate Sisters and give players even more chances to win big.

The first was the one who spun the thread of life. The second wound it on the spindle and decided how much thread was to be allotted to each person. And finally, the third is the one who, with scissors, cut it, thus putting an end to a person's life.

To make all this attractive, several bonus features have been presented, such as the Sisters' Gift, which is activated when you see the three protagonists simultaneously positioned on reels 1, 3, 5. 3. Clotho: starts with 8 free spins and random Jokers. 3 random Jokers are added for each free spin.

Final considerations on the slot Age of the Gods Fate Sisters

Age of the Gods Fate Sisters is definitely a fantastic slot for the functions it offers, capable of worthily representing the entire gaming experience. The idea is not bad, the graphic project is well made, but the maximum care in the bonus games will definitely surprise every type of player.
